subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN4171, how did it go?
description_text: Good afternoon and happy new year! I have received this order and realised that the item is not required as I received the item as part of my pedals order that i also received for Christmas. The plus X pedals and VAMs have been fantastic! How would I go about returning this order to you for refund? I am also looking to purchase your new pro shifter but I’ve been waiting to see any reviews, any discounts available for being a valued customer would be much appreciated! Kind regards David Sent from my iPhone On 31 Dec 2025, at 13:29, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote: ﻿ Hello David, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Hello David, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback Plus X Pedal Control Box Dislike it Love it! Unsubscribe

conversations.body_text: Hi David Kerr,    I apologize for not responding to you sooner. International returns are quite costly. You may keep the control box, and we will provide you with a $20 gift card. Is that acceptable?
I would gladly accept the gift of a $20 voucher. Thank you! David Sent from my iPhone
Hi David Kerr,    Okay, we've sent you: gbh3kmh8ptdhbwp9
